Verses: 1 yosuvaa Vayadhusendru Mudhirndhavanaanapodhu, Karththar Avanai Nokki: Nee Vayadhusendravanum Mudhirndhavanumaanaai; Sudhandhariththukkollavendiya Dhesam Innum Magaa Visdhaaramaayirukkiradhu.

2 meedhiyaayirukkira Dhesam Evaiyenil, Egipthukku Edhiraana Seekor Aaruthuvakkik Kaanaaniyarai Serndhadhaaga Ennappadum Vadakkeyirukkira Ekronin Ellaimattumulla Pelistharin Ellaa Ellaigalum, Kesoorim Muzhuvadhum,
3 kaasaa, Asdhodh, Askalon, Kaadh, Ekron Engira Pattanangalilirukkira Pelistharudaiya Aindhu Adhipadhigalin Naadum, Aaviyarin Naadum,
4 therke Thuvakki Aappekmattum Emoriyar Ellaivaraikkum Irukkira Kaanaaniyarin Sagala Dhesamum, Seedhoniyarukkaduththa Meyaaraa Naadum,
5 kipliyarin Naadum, Sooriyodhayamaaip Puraththil Ermon Malaiyadivaaraththil Irukkira Paagaalkaadh Mudharkondu Aamaaththukkul Pravesikkumattumulla Leebanon Muzhuvadhum,

6 leebanon Thuvakki Misrapodhmaayeem Mattum Malaigalil Kudiyirukkira Yaavarudaiya Naadum, Seedhoniyarudaiya Ellaa Naadumdhaane. Naan Avargalai Isravel Puththirarukku Munbaagath Thuraththuven; Naan Unakkuk Kattalaiyittapadiye, Nee Isravelukku Sudhandharamaaga Seettugalaimaaththiram Pottudhesaththaip Pangidavendum.
7 aadhalaal Indha Dhesaththai Onbadhu Koththirangalukkum, Manaaseyin Paadhikkoththiraththukkum Sudhandharamaagap Pangidu Endraar.

8 manaaseyin Paadhikkoththiraththaarum Roobaniyarum Kaaththiyarum Thangal Sudhandharaththai Adaindhu Theerndhadhu; Adhaik Karththarin Dhaasanaagiya Mose Yordhaanukku Appuraththil Kizhakke Avargalukkuk Koduththaan.
9 arnon Aatrangaraiyilirukkira Aaroverum, Nadhiyin Maththiyilirukkira Pattanamum Thuvakkith Theebonmattumirukkira Medhebaavin Samanaana Boomiyaavaiyum,
10 esponilirundhu Ammon Puththirarin Ellaimattum Aanda Emoriyarin Raajaavaagiya Seegonukkuriya Sagala Pattanangalaiyum,
11 keeleyaaththaiyum, Kesooriyar Maagaaththiyarudaiya Ellaiyilulla Naattaiyum, Ermon Malai Muzhuvadhaiyum,

12 astharoththilum Edhreyilum Aandu, Mose Muriya Adiththuth Thuraththina Raatchadharil Meedhiyaayirundha Paasaanin Raajaavaagiya Okukku Salkaamattumirundha Paasaan Muzhuvadhaiyum Avargalukkuk Koduththaan.
13 isravel Puththiraro Kesooriyaraiyum Maagaaththiyaraiyum Thuraththividavillai, Kesooriyarum Maagaaththiyarum Innaalvaraikkum Isravelin Naduve Kudiyirukkiraargal.
14 leviyarin Koththiraththukkumaaththiram Avan Sudhandharam Kodukkavillai; Isravelin Dhevanaagiya Karththar Avargalukku Sonnapadiye, Avarudaiya Thaganapaligale Avargaludaiya Sudhandharam.
15 mose Rooban Puththirarin Koththiraththukku Avargaludaiya Vamsangalukkuth Thakkadhaaga Sudhandharam Koduththaan.
16 arnon Aatrangaraiyilirukkira Aaroverum, Aatrin Maththiyilirukkira Pattanam Thodangi Medhepaavaraikkummulla Samaboomi Muzhuvadhum,
17 samaboomiyilirukkira Esponum, Adhin Ellaappattanangalumaagiya Theebon, Paamodhpaagaal, Pedhpaagaalmeyon,
18 yaaksaa, Kedhemodh, Mepaagaadh,
19 keeriyaaththaayeem, Sipmaa, Pallaththaakkin Malaiyilulla Seredhsagaar,
20 pedhpeyor, Asthodhpiskaa, Pedhyesimodh Mudhalaana

21 samaboomiyilulla Ellaap Pattanangalum, Esponil Aandirundha Seegon Ennum Emoriyarudaiya Raajaavin Raajyam Muzhuvadhum Avargal Ellaikkullaayitru; Andha Seegonaiyum, Dhesaththile Kudiyirundhu Seegonin Adhipadhiyaayirundha Evi, Rekkem, Soor, Oor, Repaa Ennum Meedhiyaanin Prabukkalaiyum Mose Vettippottaan.
22 isravel Puththirar Vettina Matravargalodun Kooda, Peyorin Kumaaranaagiya Paalaam Ennum Kurisollugiravanaiyum Pattayaththinaal Vettippottaargal.
23 appadiye Yordhaanum Adharkaduththadhum Rooban Puththirarin Ellaiyaayitru; Indhap Pattanangalum Ivaigalin Graamangalum Rooban Puththirarukku, Avargal Vamsangalinpadi Vandha Sudhandharam.
24 kaadhpuththirarin Koththiraththukku Mose Avargal Vamsangalukkuth Thakkadhaagak Koduththadhu Ennavenil:
25 yaaserum, Keeleyaaththin Sagala Pattanangalum, Rapaavukku Edhire Irukkira Aarovermattumulla Ammon Puththirarin Paadhi Dhesamum,
26 espon Thuvakki Raamaadh Mispemattum Peththoneem Varaikkum Irukkiradhum, Maganaayeem Thuvakkith Thepeerin Ellaimattum Irukkiradhum,

27 esponin Raajaavaagiya Seegonudaiya Raajyaththin Matrap Pangaagiya Pallaththaakkilirukkira Peththaaraamum, Pedhnimraavum, Sukkoththum Saapponum, Yordhaanmattum Irukkiradhum, Kizhakke Yordhaanin Karaiyoramaaik Kinnaredh Kadalin Kadaiyaandharamattum Irukkiradhum, Avargal Ellaikkullaayitru.
28 indhap Pattanangalum Ivaigalin Graamangalum Kaadh Puththirarukku, Avargaludaiya Vamsangalinpadi Vandha Sudhandharam.
29 manaase Puththirarin Paadhikkoththiraththukkum Mose Avargal Vamsaththukkuth Thakkadhaagak Koduththaan.
30 maganaayeem Thuvakki, Paasaanin Raajaavaagiya Ogin Muzhu Raajyamaayirukkira Paasaan Muzhuvadhum, Paasaanilulla Yaaveerin Sagala Oorgalumaana Arubadhu Pattanangal Avargal Ellaikkullaayitru.

31 paadhik Keeleyaaththaiyum, Paasaanile Astharodh, Edhreyi Ennum Oru Raajyaththin Pattanangalaiyum, Manaaseyin Kumaaranaagiya Maakeerin Puththirar Paadhiperukku Avargalin Vamsangalinpadiye Koduththaan.
32 mose Kizhakke Erigovin Aruge Yordhaanukku Akkaraiyilirukkira Movaabin Samanaana Veligalil Sudhandharamaagak Koduththavaigal Ivaigale.
33 levikoththiraththirku Mose Sudhandharam Kodukkavillai, Isravelin Dhevanaagiyakarththar Avargalukku Solliyirukkirapadi, Avare Avargaludaiya Sudhandharam.
